attributes.action: Stop corporate branding of historic sights
attributes.additional_details: In light of the board of directors (NUFC) decision to re-name Newcastle United's football ground (St.James' Park) to that of a well known high street sports retailer, We the undersigned, ask that The Government look into this practice, and ban Companies/Groups etc from re-naming places of local, national and International importance for corporate and/or monetary gain.
